question: Which Bank has launched a virtual property exhibition named ‘Home Utsav’?
explanation:
India’s leading private sector lender ICICI Bank has launched a virtual property exhibition called ‘Home Utsav’. Real estate projects promoted by renowned developers across important cities of the country would be showcased in the exhibition.
The Bank has also offered special concession in interest rates, processing fee along with facility of digital sanction of loans to its customers who are buying properties through the exhibition.
